metadata.generated_description: Generate videos with synchronized audio from a text prompt or a single input image. Use 1–3 reference images to maintain character or style consistency across shots (reference-to-video/R2V), or provide a start image and an ending frame to interpolate a smooth transition between them. Interpret complex, cinematic prompts including camera movements and scene details, producing coherent motion and realistic interactions. Output 4, 6, or 8-second clips at 720p or 1080p in 16:9 or 9:16; guide audio by describing dialogue, sound effects, or music in the prompt. Reference images work only with 16:9 and 8‑second clips; when reference images are provided, the last-frame option is ignored.

The god is part-machine, part-divine, with glowing circuitry veins running across metallic skin, eyes burning like holographic suns. Below, the city pulses with electric blues, hot pinks, and deep purples, skyscrapers covered in shifting holographic ads. The camera tilts upward from the crowded Shibuya Crossing, where thousands of cybernetic citizens and drones swarm beneath glowing umbrellas in the rain, to reveal the god towering above the skyline, its form half-shrouded in digital static and luminous smoke. Lightning arcs through the clouds, casting dramatic shadows across the neon-lit city. Cinematic, surreal, ultra-detailed, with an epic, divine-meets-technological atmosphere.

model.name: ltx-video
model.description: LTX-Video is the first DiT-based video generation model capable of generating high-quality videos in real-time. It produces 24 FPS videos at a 768x512 resolution faster than they can be watched.

input.prompt: A woman with long brown hair and light skin smiles at another woman with long blonde hair. The woman with brown hair wears a black jacket and has a small, barely noticeable mole on her right cheek. The camera angle is a close-up, focused on the woman with brown hair's face. The lighting is warm and natural, likely from the setting sun, casting a soft glow on the scene. The scene appears to be real-life footage.
input.negative_prompt: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, watermark

metadata.generated_description: Generate videos from text prompts or from an image plus text prompt. Produce 24 FPS videos with real-time generation at typical 768x512 resolution, with configurable aspect ratios and lengths (97–257 frames). Accept an optional starting frame for image-to-video with controllable adherence (image_noise_scale) and prompt strength (cfg). Supports target sizes from 512 to 1024 and works best with long, detailed English prompts.

results.name: lightricks/ltx-video
results.description: Generate videos from text prompts or from an image plus text prompt. model.name: video-01-director
model.description: Generate videos with specific camera movements

input.prompt: [truck left, pan right, tracking shot] bullet time effect

metadata.generated_description: Generate 6-second 720p videos with precise camera movements from text prompts, optionally starting from a first-frame image. Accept bracketed commands or natural language and combine up to three movements per shot. Supported movements: Truck left/right, Pan left/right, Push in/Pull out, Pedestal up/down, Tilt up/down, Zoom in/out, Tracking shot, Shake, Static shot. Includes preset combos such as left circling [truck left, pan right, tracking shot], right circling [truck right, pan left, tracking shot], walking shots [truck left/right, tracking shot], and dynamic pairs [push in + pedestal up], [truck left + pedestal up], [pan right/left + zoom in], [pedestal down + tilt up]. Outputs 25fps clips; the first-frame image sets aspect ratio and initial composition; an optional prompt optimizer can refine prompts.

input.prompt: high speed supercar driving on the beach at sunset

metadata.generated_description: Generate cinematic videos from a text prompt or a reference image. Optimize for fast, low-cost inference (30–60% faster and ~60% cheaper than Seedance 1.0 Pro) to support rapid iteration, previews, storyboarding, and large-scale pipelines. Accept text or image inputs and output 2–12 second videos at 24 fps up to 1080p. Control framing and motion with aspect ratios (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, 3:4, 9:16, 21:9, 9:21), a camera-fixed toggle, and an optional seed for reproducibility. Provide stable, artifact-reduced motion suitable for batch or real-time workloads; not optimized for 3D or physics-based realism.

metadata.generated_description: Generate videos from text prompts. Control clip length via number of frames (30–170) and frame rate (10–60 fps), and tune guidance scale, inference steps, and seed for reproducibility. Produce 480p clips optimized for photorealistic styles with high-fidelity motion and strong prompt adherence. For best results, focus on a single central subject and consider prompt phrases like “close shot”, “medium shot”, and “high resolution 4k” to reduce warping. Released under Apache-2.0.

results.name: genmoai/mochi-1

Control clip length via number of frames (30–170) and frame rate (10–60 fps), and tune guidance scale, inference steps, and seed for reproducibility. Produce 480p clips optimized for photorealistic styles with high-fidelity motion and strong prompt adherence. For best results, focus on a single central subject and consider prompt phrases like “close shot”, “medium shot”, and “high resolution 4k” to reduce warping. Released under Apache-2.0.
results.model_description: Mochi 1 preview is an open video generation model with high-fidelity motion and strong prompt adherence in preliminary evaluation

model.name: wan-2.2-i2v-a14b
model.description: Image-to-video at 720p and 480p with Wan 2.2 A14B

input.prompt: Golden hour, soft lighting, warm colors, saturated colors, wide shot, left-heavy composition. A weathered gondolier stands in a flat-bottomed boat, propelling it forward with a long wooden pole through the flooded ruins of Venice. The decaying buildings on either side are cloaked in creeping vines and marked by rusted metalwork, their once-proud facades now crumbling into the water. The camera moves slowly forward and tilts left, revealing behind him the majestic remnants of the city bathed in the amber glow of the setting sun. Silhouettes of collapsed archways and broken domes rise against the golden skyline, while the still water reflects the warm hues of the sky and surrounding structures.

metadata.generated_description: Generate short silent videos from a single image and a text prompt. Animate a reference image with camera motion and scene dynamics using Wan 2.2 I2V A14B. Control resolution (480p or 720p; landscape 16:9 or portrait 9:16), frames (81–100), frame rate (5–24 fps, 16 fps default), sampling steps, sample shift, seed, and an optional fast mode. Outputs a video clip.

results.name: wan-video/wan-2.2-i2v-a14b

model.name: i2vgen-xl
model.description: RESEARCH/NON-COMMERCIAL USE ONLY: High-Quality Image-to-Video Synthesis via Cascaded Diffusion Models

input.prompt: A blonde girl in jeans

metadata.generated_description: Generate short videos from a single image and a text prompt. Animate the input image into a coherent clip (default 16 frames) by describing the scene or desired motion, preserving the source appearance while synthesizing subject or camera movement via cascaded diffusion. Control clip length with frame count and randomness with seed. Research/non-commercial use only.

model.name: hailuo-2.3-fast
model.description: A lower-latency image-to-video version of Hailuo 2.3 that preserves core motion quality, visual consistency, and stylization performance while enabling faster iteration cycles.

input.prompt: lots of short cuts, she tries out many different haircuts, head moves only slightly, her hands interact with the hair

metadata.generated_description: Animate a single image into short videos guided by a text prompt. Accepts a first-frame image and prompt, and outputs a 6–10 second video at 768p or 1080p (10s available only at 768p; 1080p limited to 6s). Preserve subject/scene consistency with realistic motion and stylized looks while prioritizing low latency for rapid iteration. Keep the source image’s aspect ratio, optionally use a prompt optimizer, and note that last-frame handling is not supported.

results.name: minimax/hailuo-2.3-fast
results.description: Animate a single image into short videos guided by a text prompt. Accepts a first-frame image and prompt, and outputs a 6–10 second video at 768p or 1080p (10s available only at 768p; 1080p limited to 6s). Preserve subject/scene consistency with realistic motion and stylized looks while prioritizing low latency for rapid iteration. Keep the source image’s aspect ratio, optionally use a prompt optimizer, and note that last-frame handling is not supported.
results.model_description: A lower-latency image-to-video version of Hailuo 2.3 that preserves core motion quality, visual consistency, and stylization performance while enabling faster iteration cycles.
